content:
BatchServiceClient BatchServiceClient Class

In this Article

Edit

A client for issuing REST requests to the Azure Batch service.

Syntax

Declaration

public class BatchServiceClient : Rest.ServiceClient<BatchServiceClient>, IBatchServiceClient, IDisposable, IAzureClientPublic Class BatchServiceClient
    Inherits Rest.ServiceClient(Of BatchServiceClient)
    Implements IBatchServiceClient, IDisposable, IAzureClient
